Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしが一緒に行っても 本当に大丈夫なのでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it really going to be all right having me accompany you?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしとクレアの事を、あのご両親が 知ったら、どんなに悲しむ事か……
Entry.EnglishText: If Claire's parents were to find out about what happened between me and her, how upset would they be...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下、本当の事を伝えるべきかどうか、 私にもわかりません……ですが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Your Majesty, as to whether or not you should let them know about that, I can't say... However...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうか、この現実から逃げないで下さい。 あのご両親と正面から向き合って下さい。
Entry.EnglishText: Please, don't try to escape reality. I would like you to meet face-to-face with her parents...

Entry.JapaneseText: あのご両親やクレアさん、そして…… 陛下ご自身のためにも……
Entry.EnglishText: For their sake, and for Claire's sake... And also for your own sake...
